COMPANYINFORMATION.HELP: Use here your legal address information, not the address from for instance a certain processing location or office.
COMPANYINFORMATION.SUBTITLE: Address Information Recycling Plant
COMPANYINFORMATION.TITLE: Company information

SUCCESS.DESCRIPTION: Please check your email for the link to reset your password
SUCCESS.TITLE: Password reset requested

PROXIES.DESCRIPTION: Proxies are the organizations that have access to your reports. In this overview you can control who has access to your reports for a given reporting year and recycling process
PROXIES.TITLE: Your proxies

RECYCLING-PARTNERS.DESCRIPTION: Add here the legal information for all the different recycling partners you work with. Only add the address information where the actual recycling plants are located.
RECYCLING-PARTNERS.TITLE: Recycling Partners

RECYCLING-PROCESSES.DESCRIPTION: Add all the different battery chemistry types you process. Per battery type define which recycling site sare involved and provide some additional information regarding the recycling process.

LABELS.DESCRIPTION: Choose a description for this recycling step
LABELS.DESCRIPTION-DESCRIPTION: This is the identifier you typically use in your organisation for this recycling step. Take something that everyone in your organisation understands
LABELS.NAME: Choose a name for this recycling process
LABELS.PRECEDING-STEP: If any, choose a preceding step
LABELS.QUALITATIVE-DESCRIPTION-DESCRIPTION: Lorem Ipsum Dolor Sit Amet Consectetur Adipisicing Elit Sed Do Eiusmod Tempor Incididunt Ut Labore Et Dolor
LABELS.RECYCLING-SITE-OWNER: Is this your recycling site or from one of your partners?
LABELS.SCHEMATIC-OVERVIEW-DESCRIPTION: Lorem Ipsum Dolor Sit Amet Consectetur Adipisicing Elit Sed Do Eiusmod Tempor Incididunt Ut Labore Et Dolor
LABELS.UPLOAD-FILE-WITH-FURTHER-DETAILS: (upload a file with further details on your recycling process)

RECYCLING-PROCESSES.PROCESS-DESCRIPTION: Add every recycling step that makes up your recycling process. Per recycling step you can define the recycling site and provide a process description.
RECYCLING-PROCESSES.TITLE: Recycling Processes

DESCRIPTION.FILE-REPORT: If your report is complete and ready you can file it. After you have filed your report you can’t make any further changes.
DESCRIPTION.SAVE-REPORT: You can save this report temporarily and change or complete it on a future date.

LABELS.MASS: Mass (t) on a dry weight basis
LABELS.MASS-JACKET: Mass of external jacket of waste batteries and accumulators (kg) (to be included in the input fraction)
LABELS.MASS-OUTER-CASINGS: Mass of outer casings belonging to battery pack (kg) (to be excluded from the input fraction)
LABELS.METHODOLOG-CHEMICAL: Description of methodology to determine the share of different types of waste battery or accumulator present in an input fraction
LABELS.METHODOLOG-WASTE: Description of the methodology to determine the chemical composition of the batteries
LABELS.SHARE-BATTERY: Share of battery type in input fraction
LABELS.WEIGHT-BATTERY: Weight battery type in input fraction

TITLES.ELEMENTS-COMPONENTS: Elements or components, which are part of the input fractions

DESCRIPTION.RECYCLING-PROCESS: Choose the recycling process and accompanying battery chemistry type for which you can to file a report.
DESCRIPTION.REPORT-NAME: Give this report a name. This can be the name of the process like “Nickel Cadnium 2017” or you can include the name of the receiver, like for instance “Nickel Cadnium processing for Name Client “.
DESCRIPTION.REPORT-RECEIVER: If this report is only intended for a specific organisation you can choose this organisation from the list.
DESCRIPTION.REPORTING-YEAR: Choose the year for which you want to file a report. The reporting year is the year over which you are declaring, not the actual year.
